data.name: DEEP SPACE ANOMALY: Soundtrack + ART
data.detailed_description:
Atmospheric, dynamic soundtracks and arts for game DEEP SPACE ANOMALY

Arts by Ivan Shibanov (ShivArt)

Track List:

  • Marcus Neonelli - Aldebaran
  • Dj Bestixxx - The Frequency
  • Mindcarver - Rocket Ride
  • Skyshok - Breakneck speed
  • Skyfield - Quantum Leap
  • Speces90 - rain
  • Digital Entity - Elysium
  • MY STEREO TRIP - Hooch fat (cut version)
  • Somatic Reaction - Der Kokon (Both Sides Mix)

    The files can be accessed from Steam client -> Library -> Music
    Or your Steam folder.

data.short_description: Atmospheric, dynamic soundtracks and art for DEEP SPACE ANOMALY

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD / Intel 1.8GHz or faster
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM. Latest WHQL drivers
  • Storage: 88 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Would help with playing music :)
